## Front Matter
```{r}
# clean up workspace environment
rm(list = ls())

# all packages used for the assignment
library(mosaic)
library(tidyverse)
library(manipulate)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
```


## Gathering Data
```{r}
library(readxl)
fooddata <- read_excel("~/Desktop/fooddata1.xlsx")
head(fooddata)
```

## Cleaning Data
```{r}
#renaming and mutating
fooddata <-
  fooddata %>%
  filter(row_number() > 1)%>%
  rename(pop = 'POP2010',
         housingunits = 'OHU2010',
    novehicle = 'TractHUNV',
         SNAP = 'TractSNAP')%>%
  mutate(novehicle=(novehicle/pop)*100, SNAP=(SNAP/pop)*100)
head(fooddata)
```

#Variable Selection
```{r}
#selecting
fooddata <-
  fooddata %>%
    group_by(State)%>%
  filter(row_number() > 1)%>%
  select(State, County, pop, housingunits, Urban, PovertyRate, MedianFamilyIncome, novehicle, SNAP)
head(fooddata)
```

#Graphing
```{r}
#GRAPH1
fooddata %>%
  group_by(State, County) %>%
  filter(novehicle > 0)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=PovertyRate, y=novehicle)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  facet_wrap(~Urban) +
  xlim(0,5)+
  ylim(0,3)
```
